thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 133 of 3214
thread.title: KEITH WILSON

author: KEITH WILSON
title: KEITH WILSON
text: I was recommended by a friend to use Rentalcars at Gatwick airport. Initially it was a little hard to find. But it was made up by the extremely friendly and helpful staff. The car was very close to the office and I was underway in 10 minutes. The car was not what I had booked but I was very pleased with it (fiat 500) and the price of under 15 pounds was unbelievable. On my return I had a problem with my leg and the staff dealt with me very quickly and could not have been more careing and helpful. I have no hesitation in recommending Rentalcars to my friends and I will use them again most definitely on any future visits. Take a tip from me, use them you wont be disappointed. Thank you Rentalcars. Keith Wilson
